channel.title: ! MY 508 CLIENT WONT WORK! help please
channel.description:
right i got a 508 server and client i was playing it yesterday but now wen i load it i log in and the screen goes white? i show's in screen shot
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/6giejc.jpg[/img]
LOOK THE SCREEN GOES CLIENT SCREEN GOES WHITE AND TH RUN SAYS THERE ERROR?
if anyone could help it would be appreciated thanks ~sam
